extracted_playbook.title: Review SAP Security Note#2934135
extracted_playbook.description: Review the SAP Security Note#2934135 for detailed information on the vulnerability and recommended actions.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Critical Patches
extracted_playbook.description: Apply critical patches to affected SAP components as soon as possible, prioritizing external-facing systems first, followed by internal systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Access SAP One Support Launchpad
extracted_playbook.description: Access the SAP One Support Launchpad to download patched versions of affected components.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan SAP Systems for Vulnerabilities
extracted_playbook.description: Scan SAP systems for known vulnerabilities, including missing security patches, dangerous configurations, and vulnerabilities in custom code.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Secure Configuration of SAP Landscape
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that the SAP landscape is securely configured to prevent unauthorized access and exploitation.

extracted_playbook.title: Analyze SAP Interface Security Settings
extracted_playbook.description: Identify and analyze the security settings of SAP interfaces between systems and applications to understand risks posed by trust relationships.

extracted_playbook.title: Analyze Systems for Malicious User Authorizations
extracted_playbook.description: Analyze systems for malicious or excessive user authorizations to prevent unauthorized access and privilege escalation.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Systems for Indicators of Compromise
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor systems for indicators of compromise resulting from the exploitation of vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Systems for Suspicious User Behavior
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor systems for suspicious user behavior, including both privileged and non-privileged users, to detect potential security breaches.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Threat Intelligence on New Vulnerabilities
extracted_playbook.description: Apply threat intelligence on new vulnerabilities to improve security posture against advanced targeted attacks.
